name: Hexagroove: Tactical DJ
description:
Hexagroove combines strategy, rhythm, and action in a blend of self-expression.

Your goal as a DJ is to trigger musical loops while following 6 rules of music making to polish your artistic skills. Action swings from contemplative to frantic as you move between song sections in one of 15 dance genres.

Over time you'll unlock new music, DJ tricks, and club venues to play in with up to 3 friends.



  • Choose and combine musical pieces across 720 loops from 15 dance genres
  • Follow UI lighting cues to clear the level in one of 8 club venues
  • Time rhythmic elements and audio filters
  • Perform DJ tricks to maximise your score
  • 1-4P local multiplayer



Hexagroove follows a tour of classic dance genres to modern trends, each split into 48 combinable looping blocks allowing you to create music to your own tastes. Sound design by: Legowelt, Yuji Takenouchi, Runners Club 95, Cylon, no. 9, Big Skapinsky, TWIDDL, Kristoffer Wallman, lallow, Mr. YT / missing soul, Junya Nakano, and Yasuo Sato
